## DownloadOpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DownloadOpts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [expire](./dl-asset.downloadopts.expire.md) | <code>number</code> | Expiry time for generated object URL. Use value &lt; 0 to disable. |
|  [mime](./dl-asset.downloadopts.mime.md) | <code>string</code> | MIME type. If not given, attempts to derive MIME type from given filename extension (e.g. <code>.svg</code>) and if that fails, falls back to default value. |
|  [utf8](./dl-asset.downloadopts.utf8.md) | <code>boolean</code> | If true, converts source string to UTF-8. Only used if input is a string. |
